text:
CircleUp - San Francisco / Remote US - Full Stack Developer We're a Google Ventures & USV backed startup building an online marketplace for investors to connect with entrepreneurs.

We are looking for smart, full-stack generalists who are excited to build & launch new features, work with business & design stakeholders to solve problems, and experiment & iterate on a product in true lean startup fashion. Moving fast is necessary; breaking things is optional :)

Our tech stack is Python/Django on the backend and AngularJS on the frontend. We're doing powerful things with machine learning in Python, and experimenting with Docker in production.

Work from San Francisco or work remotely anywhere in the US.

https://circleup.com/jobs/engineer/
